parameters.html:

Hi {{ (($json["Customer Name"]||"").split(" ")[0] || "there") }} üëã, here are your request details.
Summary üìã
Order ID {{$json["Order ID"]}}
Order Type {{$json["Order Type"]}}
Product {{$json["Product"]}}
Quantity {{$json["Quantity"]}}
Name {{$json["Customer Name"]}}
Phone {{$json["Phone"]}}
Email {{$json["Email"]}}
City {{$json["City"]}}
Address {{$json["Address"]}}
Exchange details üîÅ
Original Order {{ (function(){var n=$json["Note"]||"";var m=n.match(/Original Order:\s*([^|]+)/);return (m&&m[1]?m[1].trim():"-");})() }}
Original Product {{ (function(){var n=$json["Note"]||"";var m=n.match(/Original Product:\s*([^|]+)/);return (m&&m[1]?m[1].trim():"-");})() }}
Original Price {{ (function(){var n=$json["Note"]||"";var m=n.match(/Original Price:\s*([^|]+)/);return (m&&m[1]?m[1].trim():"-");})() }}
New Product {{ (function(){var n=$json["Note"]||"";var m=n.match(/New Product:\s*([^|]+)/);return (m&&m[1]?m[1].trim():"-");})() }}
New Price {{ (function(){var n=$json["Note"]||"";var m=n.match(/New Price:\s*([^|]+)/);return (m&&m[1]?m[1].trim():"-");})() }}
Price Difference {{ (function(){var n=$json["Note"]||"";var m=n.match(/Price Difference:\s*([^|]+)/);return (m&&m[1]?m[1].trim():"-");})() }}
Action Required {{ (function(){ var n=$json["Note"]||""; var m1=n.match(/Customer will receive\s*([0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]{1,2})?)\s*EGP\s*refund/i); var amt=m1?m1[1]:null; if(!amt){ var m2=n.match(/Price Difference:\s*-\s*([0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]{1,2})?)\s*EGP/i); if(m2) amt=m2[1]; } return amt ? (" " + Number(amt).toFixed(2) + " EGP refund") : "-"; })() }}
¬© GrindCTRL
